RequireAdminToPrintLocally.description: Require an administrator password to print to locally connected printers

FooterFontName.description: The name of the font to use for the footer eg. Courier

PrintFooter.description: Print a page footer including the user name and date

PrintMACAddress.description: Include the MAC address of the user's computer in the footer

PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

DisplayName.description: The display name of the Default Printer

DeviceURI.description: The device URI of the Default Printer

UserPrinterList.description: A list of printers to manage. The PPD software must already exist on the target

QueueName.description: The queue name of the printer, must not include spaces or special characters. Not shown to the user.

PPDURL.description: The path to the PPD file. Local file URLs should be prefixed with file://localhost/

DisplayName.description: The display name shown to the user when choosing a printer.

Option.description: Printer Options. A dict of key to value including options normally supplied to lpadmin

Model.description: The printer model usually corresponding to the PPD model name eg 2nd column of `lpinfo -m`.

PrinterLocked.description: The printer requires an administrator password

DeviceURI.description: The printer device URI, as would be passed to CUPS eg. lpd://printer.name/queue

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

AllowLocalPrinters.description: Allow printers that connect directly to user's computer

ShowOnlyManagedPrinters.description: Only show printers managed by profiles

RequireAdminToAddPrinters.description: Only administrators may modify the printer list

FooterFontSize.description: The font size (in points) of the footer
